title: Four injured in Benton Harbor shooting
content:
According to a news release from the Benton Charter Township Police Department, officers were called to the 1000 block of Blossom Lane, the Blossom Acres housing development, on report of multiple people shot.
Witnesses told police an argument took place before the shooting began. Four people were shot, police said. Two people were treated and released, however, two people remain hospitalized.
The incident remains under investigation by the Benton Township police and the FBI Violent Crimes Task Force.
